summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Seattle City Light Department, the Seattle Engineering Department, and the Seattle Water Department; extending the City Light Residential Rate Assistance rate and the Utility Credit Program to recipients of Social Security Disability Insurance benefits whose income does not exceed seventy percent of the Washington State median income; and amending Seattle Municipal Code Section 21.49.040 (Ordinance 110733, Section 21.49.040) and Seattle Municipal Code Section 21.76.030 (Ordinance 104472, Section 2).
